title: Installation issue: dyninst on NERSC Cori
body:
Using `spack@develop` (3-Aug, 4c97a0ea1cbcb42fff4cb2183552b6b6c441d791) on NERSC Cori (`cray-cnl7-haswell`) with `%intel@19.1.1.217`:

The Spack environment used to install `dyninst` is attached below along with the full build log.

```
$> spack -e . install
...

...
==> Installing dyninst
==> dyninst: Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> dyninst: Executing phase: 'build'
...
    920     [ 38%] Linking CXX shared library libpcontrol.so
     921     cd /tmp/eugeneswalker/spack-stage/spack-stage-dyninst-10.1.0-dvejlhtkjzq4g4434747ta6g7kgelop6/spack-build/proccontrol && /global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/spack_path_placeholder/
```
